content.user_title: Automate PDF processing and form filling
content.value_statement: Manual PDF handling is slow and error prone. This skill provides scripts and step by step guidance to extract, validate, and fill PDFs reliably.
actual_capabilities: Detect whether a PDF has fillable form fields using a script.
Extract fillable form field metadata and locations to JSON.
Validate field values and fill fillable PDF forms.
Convert PDF pages to PNG images for visual analysis.
Create validation images with labeled bounding boxes.
Add text annotations to non fillable PDFs from fields.json.
limitations: Requires a local Python environment with pypdf, pdf2image, and PIL.
OCR for scanned PDFs needs extra tools like pytesseract and pdf2image.
Annotation appearance can vary across PDF viewers.
Non fillable forms require manual bounding box creation.

use_cases.title: Batch process reports
use_cases.description: Merge, split, and extract data from large sets of PDF reports.

use_cases.title: Fill onboarding forms
use_cases.description: Detect fields and auto fill employee data in standard PDF forms.

use_cases.title: Validate form layouts
use_cases.description: Generate bounding box validation images to verify form field placement.

prompt_templates.title: Check form type
prompt_templates.scenario: Determine if a PDF has fillable fields
prompt_templates.prompt: Check whether contract.pdf has fillable fields and tell me the next steps for that result.

prompt_templates.title: Extract field info
prompt_templates.prompt: Extract fillable field info from intake.pdf into fields.json and summarize the field types.

prompt_templates.title: Fill a form
prompt_templates.prompt: Use field_values.json to fill intake.pdf and save the result as intake_filled.pdf.

prompt_templates.title: Non fillable workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert form.pdf to images, create fields.json with bounding boxes, validate them, and generate a filled PDF.

output_examples.input: Extract form fields from application.pdf and summarize them
output: Field types: 8 text, 2 checkbox, 1 radio group, 1 choice

best_practices: Run the fillable field check before choosing a workflow.
Validate bounding boxes with the script and visual checks.
Store field values in JSON to keep changes auditable.
anti_patterns: Skipping validation images for non fillable forms.
Guessing checkbox values without using extracted states.
Filling fields without matching page numbers.

faq.question: What PDF tools does this skill use?
faq.answer: It uses Python scripts with pypdf, pdf2image, and PIL, plus optional tools like pdfplumber and qpdf.

faq.question: What are the main limits of this skill?
faq.answer: It needs local dependencies and manual bounding boxes for non fillable forms.

faq.question: Can I integrate it into a pipeline?
faq.answer: Yes, the scripts are command line friendly and can be called from automation jobs.

faq.question: Is my PDF data stored externally?
faq.answer: No, the workflows run locally and only use files you provide.

faq.question: What if bounding boxes are rejected?
faq.answer: Fix the fields.json boxes, regenerate validation images, and rerun the checks.

faq.question: How does it compare to OCR only tools?
faq.answer: It supports structured form filling and validation, not just text recognition.
